column5: I just tried to reply to Rich's birthday carp thread, but it says the thread is closed ??  Am I doin something wrong ??
Looks like a Boo-Boo to me.
....Hmmmm, seems okay to me. Perhaps try again.
Yup, it's working OK now Spiel.  That was strange, the button that says "add reply" was saying CLOSED when I tried to reply before. Musta  been one of them little gremlin fellas.
They were probably trying to lock and delete my posts Lew and the finger slipped.  This one will probably be gone soon too
Nope, just don't like selective edits to my posts.  Guess Roy didn't like my comment to him and followed my instructions.
